attributes.title: Killed my cat!!!!
attributes.review: As soon as I opened up the app, Donald J. Trump popped up on the screen. He began yelling all kinds of racial slurs and obscenities at me. I started crying and begged him to stop, but he just told me to shut the f!ck up, then teleported out of the phone and materialized in front of me!! When his corporeal form became complete, he took my face in between his hands and slammed my head into his knee. I was writhing on the ground in pain when he started speaking latin. Donald‚Äôs eyes were glowing red and the crucifix my grandma gave me caught on fire. The blood pouring out of my nose from our knee-to-face collision began to float and formed tiny droplets all around us. Then my cat, who was watching the interaction from the doorway, started levitating toward Donald. Once my precious baby reached him, he cut her open with a knife (pulled from his third fat role) and drank all her blood. He returned back to the phone once my cat was completely empty. He really grabbed my p!ssy :( Overall a bad experience with this app!

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD AND DO NOT SUPPORT
attributes.review: Downloading this app was the WORST decision i‚Äôve ever made. Even worse that deciding to marry my ex husband, Alejandro. Upon opening the application, you are greeted with a slide show of various pictures and videos on pornography. The worse part is, you cannot skip it. After that, it asks for your full identification. It asks for your full name, date of birth, email address, mobile and home phone number, credit card number and social security number! It is an absolute invasion of privacy. Though it was suspicious, I followed each step because I trusted our President. After entering all your information and entering a verification code, you‚Äôre transported to an Instagram type of format app. As you scroll, many accounts post different pictures of our President. Some of the accounts include: @trumpsupporter69420, @trumpeatmypu$$y883, and @trumpsgianthorsecock. They have posted pictures of him an various positions and different angles. It‚Äôs been a day since I‚Äôve submitted my information, and I‚Äôve come to believe that my identity  has been stolen? My credit card statement shows that I have spent $4,000 USD on adult sex toys and various different cheetah print articles of clothing. My email has been flooded with thousands of emails from people names Phil McCrackin, Drew P. Weiner, and Holden Tudix. And whilst writing this review, I‚Äôve received 7 bogus phone calls from abortion clinics, funeral homes, and Applebees Bar & Grill. I had so much hope for the future of our country, and I really supported our President. I never understood my Generation Z has such a problem him, but I am suddenly starting to realize why. Donald Trump has lost another vote. My daughter is telling me to say to please save First Lady Melania Trump and Barron Trump from Donald. According to her, they need to be saved the most. She also says to use Barron‚Äôs preferred pronouns (they/them) #BERNIE2020
